title: Blended Language Learning Design for Educational Recovery in the Post-Pandemic Era

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and secondary-level language proficiency
context.additional_context: A customized language education course combining digital tools and face-to-face learning to address educational disparities post-pandemic.

learning_goals: Learners improve language communication skills by over 30% by integrating digital platforms with in-person instruction
Learners improve writing skills by exchanging peer feedback using online collaboration tools

Learners establish a self-directed learning plan specifying three weekly goals and ≥1 hour of daily study over four weeks in a blended learning environment (3 online lectures + 1 offline workshop), achieve ≥80% checklist completion rate, and maintain learning journals.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
